rows.label: tlk41300022_06_msg0005
rows.name:
Hey, it's you.
Are you joining the self-defense corps?
...Haha, just kidding.

rows.label: tlk41300022_06_msg0001
rows.name:
Why am I doing such a hard job
as being in the self-defense corps, I wonder.

rows.label: tlk41300022_06_msg0002
rows.name:
At first, the city was peaceful,
and the only incidents were lost items and marital quarrels.
...I miss those days.

rows.label: tlk41300022_06_msg0003
rows.name:
I'll manage somehow.
Because I love this city.

rows.label: tlk41300022_06_msg0004
rows.name:
If only those Iira folks
would just quiet down...
